item.title: Restart River5 after Reboot with PM2
item.description: I run a River5 “River of News” on a Raspberry Pi wirelessly connected to my internal home network. Sometimes, the power fluctuates and the Pi reboots. I want to have River5 restart when the system comes back up. There are lots of ways to restart stuff on Linux. (I am running Raspian GNU/Linux 8.0.) The process manager I use is PM2 – mostly because it has knowledge of Nodejs, which River5 is written for.
